events.message: The insured reported a car accident that involved a collision with another vehicle at an intersection causing moderate damage.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the description mentioning vehicle collision and resulting damages.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to facilitate communication and guide the claimant through the claims process.
Official acknowledgment of the claim has been sent to the insured, confirming receipt and initiation of claim processing.
The claimant was requested to submit the police report, photos of the damaged car, and driverâ€™s license for further assessment.
The insured promptly submitted all requested documents, including detailed photos and the official police accident report.
An internal investigation commenced to verify details of the collision and to evaluate liability and damage estimates.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of liability on the other driver and a damage estimate prepared for the insured vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed to the claimant covering repair costs, rental car expenses, and associated losses.
The claimant provided positive feedback appreciating the prompt communication and fair settlement offer from the insurer.
The claim was officially approved based on investigation outcomes and acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
The approved settlement payment was issued to the insured's account to cover all validated repair and additional costs.
The claim was closed successfully following payment disbursement and a final confirmation from the claimant.
